Review: Bolero is a true SUV in every sense. can accommodate more than 7 people, is big & have a lot of space. Works brilliantly on almost every terrain.Ride quality is good, build quality is good. Easy to maintain, although mileage is on the lower side but for a SUV like bolero this could be neglected. Mahindra could yet work on its interior looks & making a bit more comfortable an amazing car in its seg ment.

Contrary to what I heard, its a great car to own for out of town visits especially rural areas with bad roads. The seating position and stock headlamps are quite good even for night driving. Its turning radius is a little big but given its usage it is acceptable. From point of view of comfort, I have yet to drive a real long trip yet but the sub 100 kms have been a breeze.
